name: Cliq
description: “Cliq” is a derivation of the classic clicker game in which clicking has a tangible impact  to a narrative storyline’s outcome. Although only a single episode is explored, the  player’s choices (when they occur) drastically alter where the story ends and the broader implications of a single person’s choices on the rest of the world. Through  engaging dialogue, a subtle yet heavy - handed commentary, and biting absurdist humor,  “Cliq” makes the player feel as if they can make a difference with just a single click .
